analysis.description:
MINDTokenCrowdSale.postBuyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xb9738cb78ab1c0e052da1a8376d0065a0db8d8d0.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(this) == 0

MINDToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/12/0xb9738cb78ab1c0e052da1a8376d0065a0db8d8d0.sol#550-555) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb9738cb78ab1c0e052da1a8376d0065a0db8d8d0.sol#553-555)

MINDTokenCrowdSale.drainRemainingToken (/unique_chucks/12/0xb9738cb78ab1c0e052da1a8376d0065a0db8d8d0.sol#639-641) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(MIND_CROWDSALE_WALLET,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb9738cb78ab1c0e052da1a8376d0065a0db8d8d0.sol)
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xb9738cb78ab1c0e052da1a8376d0065a0db8d8d0.sol#135-138) should be declared external
